ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: Basleo, Nussa Tenggara Timur, Indonesia, Asia; about 10 to 20 miles NE of Niki-Niki. Between Niki-Niki and Noil Fatu. Also spelled as Besleo, Wesleo or Wisly. Also Noil Tonini could be the same as Basleo?
